error.message: Call to deprecated function module_load_include(). Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. Use Drupal::moduleHandler()->loadInclude($module, $type, $name = NULL). Note that including code from uninstalled extensions is no longer supported.
File modules/contrib/media_delete_all/includes/delete_all_media_batch_delete.inc could not be loaded from module_load_include.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
